cast.overview: When a band of brutal gangsters led by a crooked property developer make a play to take over the city, Master Ip is forced to take a stand.
cast.title: Ip Man 3

details.biography: Louis Cheung Kai-Chung (Chinese: 張繼聰, born 11 January 1980) is a Hong Kong Cantopop recording-artist, songwriter, and actor. He is an alumnus of The Hong Kong Academy for Performing Arts, majoring in acting. His first play was in 1997, and he has performed in a total of more than 20 stage plays, including the classic "A Streetcar Named Desire", as the main character, Stanley Kowalnski.
details.name: Louis Cheung
details.place_of_birth: Hong Kong, British Crown Colony [now China]
